title: President approves appointment of three additional judges at Peshawar High Court
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 8 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi on Tuesday approved the appointment of three additional judges at the Peshawar High Court.
Kamran Hayat Mian Khel, Mohammad Ijaz Khan and Mohammad Fahim Wali have been appointed as additional judges at Peshawar High Court for one year.
The appointment has been made under Article 175 of the Constitution.
